p: Moreover, aqueous ethanolic extract of MC seeds exposed the protection of pancreatic Î²-cells in vitro experiment [ 57]. In the treatment of type 1 diabetes mellitus, MC extract has been proven to possibly definitely improve beta cells in pancreatic islets in streptozotocin-induced type-1 diabetic rats. Related with type-1 diabetes, polypeptide-p has shown action similar to human insulin in the body and, therefore, may be used as plant-based insulin replacement in patients with type-1 diabetes [ 58]. Other studies also investigated the inhibition of diabetes-related enzymes, such as alpha-glucosidase and alpha-amylase from MC extracts [ 59].
